Package com.cafean.client.validation

Class AbstractContextWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.PrintWriter
        • com.cafean.client.validation.AbstractContextWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextWriter, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultContextWriter
    public abstract class AbstractContextWriter
extends java.io.PrintWriter
implements ContextWriter
    An abstract extension of PrintWriter and implementation of ContextWriter that includes ExportContext support for use in a validation display or ASCII viewer.

    The export context support in this class is made up of a stack and a List of export context objects. Calls to openContext(ExportContext) push the given context onto the stack. Calls to closeContext() pop the top context off of the stack and add it to the list. Calling getContext() will return the list of closed contexts.

    See Also:
    ContextWriter, DefaultContextWriter, ValidationDisplayPanel, AbstractValidationWrapper

      Constructors

      AbstractContextWriter​(java.io.Writer out)
      Creates a new context writer that passes all content through the given writer instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clear()
      Discards this writer's current contents and context in preparation for re-use.
      void closeContext()
      Ends the most recently opened context and marks its end at the current writer cursor location.
      java.util.List<ExportContext> getContext()
      Returns the list of export context objects that have been added to this writer via calls to ContextWriter.openContext(ExportContext).
      void openContext​(ExportContext context)
      Marks the beginning of the given context at the current writer cursor location and stores the context.
